[@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519)

> Who gets to decide where the money goes? 

Has there been any agreement on this, or any follow-ups on how the OpenCollective is being used? I was vaguely aware that the OpenCollective existed but didn't realize there's an estimated annual budget of $3300.
